content: कापाल, कापालिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कपाल-अण्-ठक्-वा] Relating to skulls. --लः , --लिकः A follower of a certain Śaiva sect (the left-hand order) characterized by carrying skulls of men in the form of garlands and eating and drinking from them; <ls>Pt. 1. 212.</ls> --लं A kind of leprosy. --ली {@--1@} A wreath of skulls. {@--2@} A clever woman.
